Contributing to the project

We welcome all contributions to this project!

Reporting Issues

If you notice a bug, or have a feature request, please open up an issue here. When submitting an issue, include as much relevant information as possible, such as: - A clear description of the problem or request - Steps to reproduce the issue (if applicable)

Contributing Code

If you’d like to contribute a feature or bug fix, you can fork our repo and submit a pull request. We will review pull requests within 7 days.

Pull Request Guidelines

  • Ensure your code follows the project’s coding standards and best practices.
  • Include a clear description of the changes and the reason for the contribution.
  • Reference any related issues in the pull request description (e.g., “Fixes #123”).
  • Be responsive to feedback and make any requested changes promptly.

Code of Conduct

This project prioritizes inclusivity and respect. All contributors must abide by our code of conduct.
